channel.title: [req] dragon whip
channel.description:
If someone could either give me a link or tell me how to recolor whips or items i would greatly appreciate it very much ty to whoever can.
P.S. this is my second post on this forums and I don't know alot about this.

item.title: [req] dragon whip
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

ok, ill tell you.
well get your model of the whip
convert it with datmaker to the file type “mqo”
open Metasequoia and open your whip file.
in the top left hand corner theres a tab called “system”
open it up and click on “mat panel”
a panel should open up, doubble click on one of the colors and change it to your colors of choice,
after you have the whip in your seclected colors save it and convert it to .dat with datmaker, get the ints and add it to your client!

Read full topic
